column1: European Master of Science in Radiation and its Effects on Microelectronics and Photonics Technologies (RADMEP) (Geel et al)
column5: This two-year Erasmus Mundus programme provides a multidisciplinary and innovative programme covering the interactions between Radiation and MicroElectronics and Photonics, two Key Enabling Technologies for the future of
